column1: fj,Fiji,Finance,6015,2,1531250064,MyCash Digicel,DIGICEL CENTRAL RESOURCES (FIJI) PTE LIMITED,https://apps.apple.com/fj/app/mycash-digicel/id1531250064?uo=4,0.0,3.28205,39,Finance,"Why MyCash?

Because it is the easiest, safest, and most convenient way of using cash. The MyCash wallet allows you to hold your money in one single place: your phone. With this mobile wallet, you can send money at any time, pay for items, pay your bills whenever you want, top up any Digicel prepaid phone, and receive money from abroad directly to your MyCash wallet.
MyCash is available in Fiji, Samoa, Tonga, and Vanuatu.
What can I do with MyCash?

column2: Send money – send money from a MyCash wallet to another at any time securely and fast.
Receive International Remittance – from anywhere in the world; you can directly receive money from abroad to your MyCash wallet by using digicelinternal.com or WorldRemit.
Send Digicel Top Up – send Digicel credit from anywhere you are using your MyCash wallet.
Pay merchants – use your MyCash wallet to pay for MyCash merchants' items by scanning the QR code displayed in their store.
Pay Bills - be on top of your bills by paying them using your MyCash wallet.

column1: Using MyCash wallet is easy, simple, and safe:

column2: Download the app and register
Ask another user to send you money or visit a MyCash agent or Digicel store to load cash in your wallet
Start sending money, receiving international remittance, paying to merchants, doing top up, and paying bills

column1: Holding your money in the MyCash wallet has no fees and sending money between MyCash wallets is free for limited time only.
Terms & Conditions & Monthly Charges Apply*",2020-11-25T08:00:00Z,2025-07-21T07:17:55Z

fj,Fiji,Finance,6015,3,1302760657,myFNPF,FIJI NATIONAL PROVIDENT FUND,https://apps.apple.com/fj/app/myfnpf/id1302760657?uo=4,0.0,2.10811,111,Finance,"The Fiji National Provident Fund (FNPF) is a defined contribution fund that provides superannuation services to its members. FNPF is mandated by law to collect compulsory contributions from employees and employers towards the retirement savings of all workers in Fiji. Apart from retirement savings, the Fund also provides pre-retirement benefits such as housing, medical and education assistance.

The myFNPF app will enable our members to access information regarding their personal accounts. They will also be able to track withdrawal applications lodged, view nomination records and Account balance, transactions and eligibility associated with their member account.",2017-10-30T14:19:41Z,2023-12-20T02:39:01Z

fj,Fiji,Finance,6015,4,1316832499,ANZ Pacific,ANZ Banking Group Limited,https://apps.apple.com/fj/app/anz-pacific/id1316832499?uo=4,0.0,3.14545,55,Finance,"ANZ Pacific App is our secure mobile banking app that puts your money at your fingertips. It’s now available for both personal and business customers, and you can use it anywhere – on the bus, at the beach, at home or in the office.
Manage your everyday banking
• Move money between your accounts
• Send money to anyone with an ANZ bank account
• Send money to anyone in another local bank
• Send money overseas
• Pay bills from a list of ANZ registered billers
• Set up and manage scheduled payments
• View and download your account statements in PDF format
• Update your contact details
• Send a secure Bank Mail to ANZ
Manage your business
• Access your Personal and Business profiles on one device
• Send money to anyone locally or overseas
• Approve transactions submitted for authorisation
• Set up and manage scheduled payments
• View and download your account statements in PDF format
• Send a secure Bank Mail to ANZ
Your money and personal details are protected because:
• ANZ Pacific App is guarded by high-grade encryption and we ensure none of your personal or banking details are stored on your device.
• Security Questions provides a second level of authentication for registration.
• ANZ Pacific App locks you out if you repeatedly use the wrong security PIN, Security Questions or password, and will time-out if the app is left running for too long with no activity.
How to get set up:
Getting the ANZ Pacific App is easy. To get it, you’ll need to be registered for ANZ Internet Banking first.
You will also need an iPhone or iPad running on iOS version 12.5 (or above).
To use the ANZ Pacific App, you must have a valid ANZ Internet Banking User ID and Password.
• Open the ANZ Pacific App and select your country
• Enter your UserID and Password (please ensure you read, understand and accept the Terms and Conditions)
• Set up a new 4-digit PIN and re-enter it to confirm
• Once you've entered your PIN you'll need to complete the two security questions, when successful, you will be able to access the ANZ Pacific App.
Important information
The ANZ Pacific App is provided by the branch of Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Limited ABN 11 005 357 operating in the jurisdiction where your account(s) is opened and held.

By installing the ANZ Pacific App you acknowledge and accept the ANZ Pacific App Terms and Conditions and agree to receive those terms and conditions and any amendments to them electronically via your mobile device. You acknowledge that ANZ will not send you a paper copy, but you can get a copy below:
Cook Islands: https://www.anz.com/cookislands/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/
Fiji: https://www.anz.com/fiji/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/
Kiribati: https://www.anz.com/kiribati/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/
Samoa: https://www.anz.com/samoa/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/
Solomon Islands: https://www.anz.com/solomonislands/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/
Tonga: https://www.anz.com/tonga/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/
Vanuatu: https://www.anz.com/vanuatu/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/",2017-12-17T23:43:28Z,2025-10-24T22:58:13Z

fj,Fiji,Finance,6015,5,283646709,"PayPal - Send, Manage, Pay","PayPal, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/fj/app/paypal-send-manage-pay/id283646709?uo=4,0.0,4.808,125,Finance,"There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal
SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure
ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​

*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.
MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​

Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply
BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing
SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply
MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​

Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place.
POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply
PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**

*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD",2019-02-03T08:00:00Z,2025-11-17T16:24:16Z

fj,Fiji,Finance,6015,8,1205990992,TradingView: Track All Markets,"TradingView, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/fj/app/tradingview-track-all-markets/id1205990992?uo=4,0.0,4.76,25,Finance,"In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set:
World-leading charts

A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.
Simple Pine Script for complex tools

From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.
Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.
Unmissable alerts
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.
Made to trade
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.
One app to track them all

Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.
Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.
Watchlist what matters

Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be.
Data. Data. Data,

Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.
Never trade alone again

Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.
Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.
Terms of use: https://www.tradingview.com/policies/
Privacy policy: https://www.tradingview.com/privacy-policy/",2017-04-24T11:29:54Z,2025-11-21T18:13:56Z

fj,Fiji,Finance,6015,9,1599892658,Crypto Bubbles,"MEXC Fintech, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/fj/app/crypto-bubbles/id1599892658?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Finance,"Crypto Bubbles is an interactive tool to visualize the cryptocurrency market.
Each bubble represents a cryptocurrency and can easily illustrate different values such as weekly performance or market capitalization through its size, color and content.
Highly customizable and easy to use, Crypto Bubbles helps you better understand the overwhelming cryptocurrency market.
Core Features
- Fully customizable interactive bubble chart for the 1000 biggest cryptocurrencies (Visualize price, performance, marketcap, trading volume and many more combinations)
- Click a bubble to get more detailed information about the cryptocurrency
- Add favorites to keep track of your portfolio
- Searchable list of cryptocurrencies with sortable columns
- Create, edit and delete your own chart configurations
- Live realtime updating of all market values
Additional features
- Realistic physics simulation of the bubbles
- Move bubbles around, crash them into eachother or launch a small explosion
- Holdings Calculator for every cryptocurrency
- View every bubble directly on CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko, TradingView, Binance, MEXC, Bybit, Kucoin, GateIO, Bitget, Bitmart, BingX, Coinbase, Kraken and Crypto.com with a single click
- Support for different currencies: fiat currencies (Euro, Dollar, Polish złoty, Rouble, and many more ....) but also cryptos (like Bitcoin/BTC, Ethereum/ETH and Solana/SOL)
- Translations for English, Russian, Portuguese, French, German, Persian, Polish, Spanish, Dutch, Italian, Turkish, Arabic, Thai, Japanese, Chinese, Ukrainian and Czech
Use Cases
Crypto Bubbles is perfect for getting an overview of the general movement trend of the cryptocurrency market or spot outsider cryptocurrencies,
moving differently to the market. You also get a good feeling for the marketcap or volume for example by comparing bubble sizes.
Or just take a great looking screenshot of the cryptocurrency market with Crypto Bubbles!
TRY IT. You will love it!
Contact me at contact@cryptobubbles.net or on Twitter/X @CryptoBubbles for feedback, questions and other concerns.",2022-03-02T08:00:00Z,2025-08-05T10:59:47Z

fj,Fiji,Finance,6015,11,6460258044,Budget Bestie,Budget Bestie Corp,https://apps.apple.com/fj/app/budget-bestie/id6460258044?uo=4,0.0,5,4,Finance,"hey bestie, ready to make budgeting effortless? with budget bestie, you can take full control of your money on your own terms—whether you get paid weekly, biweekly, twice a month, or monthly, we’ve got you covered. using the cash stuffing method, you’ll say goodbye to stress and hello to a budgeting approach that fits your life perfectly.
okay but what’s cash stuffing?
1. create envelopes – create an envelope for each expense category like food, eating out, rent
2. stuff your envelopes – put all of your cash into envelopes based on how much you’ll spend before you get paid again
3. spend your money – this is the fun part - don’t feel guilty for spending your hard earned money. when you buy something, use the cash from the corresponding envelope
4. get paid, repeat - record your income (cha-ching) and go back to step 2, stuff your envelopes
how budget bestie works
- no need to carry cash - we’ve taken this 100+ year old proven technique and put it in your iPhone
- say bye to math and spreadsheets - we’ll recommend how much to stuff into each envelope based on previous spending habits and upcoming bills
- avoid late fees by getting reminded - we’ll send you a notification when you haven’t recorded paying a recurring expense
- hit your savings goals - create savings envelopes and we’ll make sure you’re on track to hit your goals
- budget on your schedule - whether it’s weekly, biweekly, twice a month, or monthly, you can budget based on what works for you
what our besties are saying:

“First full month of the app and it's so simple. I've not had to dip into my emergency fund or sinking fund or use overdraft. I've even managed to put some money towards debt and not reuse it” - @Nicola Disney Pomeranian Mummy

Been using budget bestie for a month!The monthly recap made me realize I spend so much on little things (like buying to go lunch everyday) since it's in budget, but never seen how much it adds up"" – @Julia
This app is great I have been searching for a budgeting app that lets me budget per check and this is it” - @Chy6699
“Definitely helped me the last two weeks. Can't wait to see how much money I can save.” - @Erin Backes
subscription details:

before your free trial begins, you’ll choose between a monthly or annual subscription. subscriptions are billed and managed directly by Apple. you can manage or cancel your subscription anytime within your iPhone settings app.
terms of use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/",2024-06-08T07:00:00Z,2025-10-01T17:22:50Z

fj,Fiji,Finance,6015,13,6479240477,M-Selen,SOLOMON TELEKOM COMPANY LIMITED,https://apps.apple.com/fj/app/m-selen/id6479240477?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Finance,"Mobile Money Wallet, Deposit, Send Money, Withdrawal, Mobile Topup and Payments.

Introducing the M-Selen App, with a smart look and exciting features that make your life simpler and easier. Register an M-Selen wallet and deposit money right from an M-Selen Agent in just a few minutes and get started. Recharge your mobile balance and send money to anyone in the Solomon Islands, all in a highly secure mobile money app. Get suggestions from M-Selen on what services you can explore next.
FAST M-SELEN WALLET REGISTRATION

Don't have an M-Selen wallet? Just visit your nearest M-Selen Agent or Our Telekom Phone Shops. After providing a valid ID and completing any other registration requirements, you can register a new M-Selen wallet in just a few minutes.
DEPOSIT MONEY FROM M-SELEN AGENT
Now that you have an M-Selen wallet, you need money in it, right? Just visit any nearest M-Selen Agent and the Agent will support you to make the deposit to your M-Selen wallet in exchange for cash.
SEND MONEY HOME OR TO ANYONE

Now that you have money in your M-Selen wallet and would like to send money home or to anyone, use the Send Money option in the M-Selen App to transfer money to any other M-Selen wallet or to anyone who doesn't have an M-Selen wallet but has a cell phone number.
MONEY WITHDRAWAL FROM M-SELEN AGENT
Use the Cash Withdrawal option in the M-Selen App to withdraw money from your M-Selen wallet at any M-Selen Agent point.
MOBILE TOP-UP

Top up your Our Telekom mobile phone balance very quickly and without visiting any Top-up agent using the Mobile Top-up option in the M-Selen App. You can do mobile Top-up for yourself or others using your M-Selen wallet.
HIGHLY SECURE MOBILE MONEY

We take the security of your M-Selen wallet very seriously. We send you an OTP to verify your M-Selen wallet during your first log-in. The M-Selen App also asks for your PIN during both login and transactions.
STATEMENT
Exert greater control over your M-Selen wallet by accessing your detailed transaction history.
ONE-TAP BALANCE CHECK
Checking your balance is just a tap away. We also help protect your data by hiding the balance after a few seconds.
GREATER TRANSPARENCY & CONTROL

Have greater visibility over your M-Selen transactions. While entering the amount, you will see your available balance, the auto-calculated service charge, and the special Tap & Hold button allows you a few seconds to check everything in the very last moment, all before completing the transaction.",2024-03-20T07:00:00Z,2025-10-03T07:42:01Z

fj,Fiji,Finance,6015,14,1460799440,BRED Fiji Connect,BRED Bank (Fiji) Limited,https://apps.apple.com/fj/app/bred-fiji-connect/id1460799440?uo=4,0.0,4.4074,27,Finance,"Manage your money with this secure and easy-to-use BRED Fiji Connect app. From the comfort of your home, work, school or on-the-go, this app connects you to your bank account 24/7 from around the world.

fj,Fiji,Finance,6015,15,612261027,Wise - Global Money,Wise Payments Ltd,https://apps.apple.com/fj/app/wise-global-money/id612261027?uo=4,0.0,5,18,Finance,"16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.
— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics
— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details
— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction
— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts
— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed
— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more
